triples.name: Diffusion model
triples.relevance: DiffScene leverages diffusion models as the core technique for generating safety-critical scenarios.

triples.name: Self-driving car
triples.relevance: Autonomous vehicles are the primary domain for which this scenario generation method is designed.

triples.name: Adversarial machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper uses adversarial optimization objectives to guide the diffusion-based generation of safety-critical scenarios.

triples.name: Scenario planning
triples.relevance: DiffScene proposes a novel diffusion-based approach to automatically generate realistic safety-critical scenarios for AV evaluation.
